title: Litany Of The Holy Infant Mary
content:
THE LITANY OF
THE HOLY INFANT MARY.
Lord have mercy on us.
Christ have mercy on us.
Lord have mercy on us. Christ hear us.
Christ graciously hear us.
God the Father of Heaven,
have mercy on us.
God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
have mercy on us.
God the Holy Spirit,
have mercy on us
Holy Trinity, One God,
have mercy on us
Holy Infant Mary,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, Daughter of God the Father,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, Mother of God the Son,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, Spouse of God the Holy Spirit,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, possessed by the Divine Spirit
from the beginning of your ways,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, beautiful as the morn,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, brilliant as the Sun,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, terrible as an army in battle array,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, our Mistress,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, our Mother,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, powerful in weakness,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, great in littleness,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, treasure of grace,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, tabernacle of Divine Love,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, masterpiece of God's omnipotence,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, delight of your holy parents,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, Queen of Angels,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, shoot of the Patriarchs,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, foretold by the Prophets,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, procuring salvation to infants,
pray for us.
Infant Mary, resource of all mankind,
pray for us.
Be merciful to, and hear us, O Infant Mary.
Be propitious to, and intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By your Immaculate Conception, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By your Sacred Nativity, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By your glorious Presentation, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By your infancy, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By your childhood, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
By all your virtues, intercede for us, O Infant Mary.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Graciously hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Have mercy on us.
Pray for us, O Holy Infant Mary,
That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.
Let us pray.
Grant, O Lord,
that we who honour the infancy
of the Mother of Your Divine Son,
may, through her intercession,
arrive at that bliss promised to those only
who become as little children for love of You.
Through the same Jesus Christ Our Lord,
Amen.
